name: SX No Homepage Pagination
author: Daniel Roch - SeoMix

sections.description:
SX No Homepage Pagination removes properly any homepage pagination (whatever plugin or function you are using) and redirects useless paginated content.

You have to be carefull : if you don’t see pagination links on your homepage, it does not always mean that WordPress isn’t adding it in the HTML header.

This plugin works on any default homepage.

This SEO enhancement is not yet included in our SEOKEY plugin. This optimization will be added in the near future, in addition to SEOKEY’s many automatic SEO optimizations!

If you want to contribute, check this link : https://bitbucket.org/rochdaniel/sx-no-homepage-pagination, or contact me on SeoMix
sections.installation: No configuration is necessary. Upload, activate and done.
sections.faq:
Do I need to do anything else for this to work?
